00018 /*
00019  * Parameter.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *
00023  *  Created on: 14-May-2010
00024  *      Author: shravanm
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifndef PARAMETER_H_
00028 #define PARAMETER_H_
00029 
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 /**
00035  * A class to represent the various parameters like
00036  * the dirichlet conjugate weights and such
00037  *
00038  * Can be vector valued parameters
00039  *
00040  * This class additionally stores the sum and provides
00041  * functionality to dump to and initialize from disk
00042  */
00043 typedef struct Parameter {
00044     int length;
00045     double* values;
00046     double sum;
00047 
00048     Parameter();
00049     Parameter(const Parameter &param);
00050     virtual ~Parameter();
00051 
00052     Parameter& operator=(const Parameter &param);
00053     virtual void dump(string fname);
00054     virtual void initialize_from_dump(string fname);
00055     virtual void initialize_from_values(int length_, const double* values_,
00056             float sum_);
00057 } param;
00058 
00059 #endif /* PARAMETER_H_ */
